definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: How to add a factor column to dataframe based on a conditional statement from another column?
sentences.chinese: 如何基于一个帧从另一列的条件语句添加一个因素列？

sentences.english: So these were some being yourself quotes and sayings for all of you.
sentences.chinese: 以上这些是给所有读者们有关实现自我的名言语句。

sentences.english: Boolean logic is especially useful for formulating clear conditional statements.
sentences.chinese: 布尔逻辑对你规划条件语句的结构特别有用。

sentences.english: In a given script, you can use only one statement terminator.
sentences.chinese: 在一个特定的脚本中，您只能使用一个语句结束符。

sentences.english: I had only the credit of servilely copying such sentences as I was ashamed to put my name to .
sentences.chinese: 我只是荣幸地恭录那些我羞于为之署名的语句。

sentences.english: The enclosed statements should be indented four more spaces.
sentences.chinese: 被括起的语句必须多缩进四个空格。

sentences.english: Can I set the resolution and confidence values myself when I run the statement?
sentences.chinese: 我在运行该语句时，可以自己设置分辨率和置信度吗？

sentences.english: You can use all of the savepoint statements within stored procedures.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在存储过程中使用所有保存点语句。

sentences.english: Among the natter there are these sentences of wisdom .
sentences.chinese: 闲谈中夹有充满智慧的语句。

sentences.english: The synchronized block could then encompass both accesses if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 然后这个同步语句可以在需要时包含这两个访问。

sentences.english: Read and complete the sentences about you.
sentences.chinese: 读图，根据你的实际情况完成语句。

sentences.english: Enter a ROLLBACK statement and re-execute all statements since the last commit or 2.
sentences.chinese: 回滚至最近一次提交，重新执行所有语句。

sentences.english: We should purify the language of barbarisms.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该消除语言中的粗俗语句。

sentences.english: Only then can you execute this statement.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样才可以执行这条语句。

sentences.english: For some replacements, you may need to change the program logic or linkage statements.
sentences.chinese: 对于某些替换，需要修改程序逻辑或链接语句。

definition: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
